text: anthimata duwa kiyawi ammala nisa mata eekath wuna kiyala.
me lipiya palawena ada enam 2015 sapthambar masa 14 wanida, eksath jathinge sangamaye manawa himikam komisama jiniwa nuwaradi raswenawa.
me anuwa agosthu 24 wanada rathriye kapithan remand dron yatathe wu 9 wana bala aniya nagarayata athulu wiya.
mata puluwan uge oluwata ringanna.
dariyage mawath piyath kamarayata diwa giyaha.

samagama sathu mulya sthawaraya ha nawyawu prathirakshana kriyawaliya thulin nawa mawath wiwara kara ganimin pasu kala sruju gaman magehi prathipalaya sanituhan karamin rupiyal biliyana 39.5 ka mudal sambharayak sawakiya rakshana urumakaruwan wetha gewimata samathwu shri lanka inshuwarans, jiwitha rakshana oppu himiyan wetha pradanaya kala rupiyal biliyana 5.4 ka prasada dimana nikuthuwa methek rakshana ithihasaye liyawunu dawanthama rakshana prasada nikuthuwayi.

aarthika wigrahayan ha ekinekata sambanda nowena dewal kiyawaddi mata hithune gewena mohotha ethanama nathara wenawa nam kiyala witharamayi.

renga gatha gin ...

aar jothipala, anjalin gunathilakaape gamata purahandak payala - moris dahanayaka athulu pirisasapathayi mata mahajana sewe ‚Äì ech. aar. jothipalasale sale malu pataw ‚Äì latha walpola, dhammika walpolaonchilla tharu wal - anjalin gunathilakasanthane wedanawan ‚Äì ech. aar. jothipalagitha poth - shanthi pothhala, maradanachithrapataye mul nama - dekatana yodhayanalu niliyan - layanal daraniyagala (sawudan jema), githa kumarasinha (winodani), aleksandar pranandu (yureniyas), piyadasa gunasekara (kahathuduwe ralahami), soniya disa (nokki), moris dahanayaka (dharme), denawaka hamine (sawdan jemage aachchi), rubi da mel, ji. dab. perera, bandu munasinha, mak samaranayaka, shanthi lekha, bi. as. perera, di. aar. nanayakkara, don sirisena, liliyan edirisinha, piyadasa wijekonpradarshanaya ‚Äì gamini, plasa, anusha - maharagama, oodiyan - mahanuwara, raj ‚Äì migamuwa, samudra - waththala athulu dewana mandalaye sinama shala 15 kadipradarshana kalaya ‚Äì dina 36 wana wita mulshala 5 kata sima wiya.
